CustomField.description:
SF Person Record can be any Salesforce Person Record. It can be a Lead, Contact, User. This can be a merge field from the record generating the document.
Static Name and Email will always go to that person.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
SF Person Record can be any Salesforce Person Record. It can be a Lead, Contact, User. This can be a merge field from the record generating the document.
Static Name and Email will always go to that person.
CustomField.label: Signatory Type
